column4: hello, i am considering buying a new laptop from hp, and was wondering if there is a way to see if the parts are all linux compatible. the laptop is known as "dv2911us"
how would i make sure everything will be functional?
if you can put a linux livecd in and test it, then it is.
i don't have the laptop. are you saying that i go into a store that has it and test it there somehow?
